mod.name: Stick War 2: Kaizo
mod.description: Gear up and fight against one of the most powerful enemies in Stick War history in 'Stick War 2: Kaizo'! You have new upgrades on your side, but so do they... Are you up for the ultimate challenge?
mod.developers:
Mod By: Stick War 2 Custom Mods Developers.
Special thanks to: TheDescendant(ShadowEmpire).
mod.additional_credits:
s07 for playtesting (suffering) an early version.
Kaizo Mario World for starting the Kaizo trend.
